## The Community Group has kicked off!
Thanks to everyone who joined us this afternoon - we hope you found it inspiring! Keen to join our Community? Please [fill out the survey](https://nl.surveymonkey.com/r/XS7HGR5) so we can get in touch!

In the meantime, have a look at the [PAGE presentation](/res/DDMoRe_Thoughtflow_PAGE_final.pdf) and the [draft ontology specification](/res/Capturing_Pharmacometrics_Workflow_Concepts_with_PROV-O_311016.pdf) for more info on Thoughtflow. More to come soon!
